alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 5:38PM MDT until June 23 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTY... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. Although the rain has ended, high water and flooding is expected to continue into the evening, especially along Spearfish Creek. Additional rainfall is expected again around 730 PM. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Spearfish FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
